name: Sacrifier Beta
description:
Sacrifier is a game where you have to sacrifie yourself!

Monsters will spawn and start to attack you! Fight back with the left mouse button (LMB) and move with W,A,S and D!

Killing a monster will give you that amount of health and xp that the monster had atk.

XP needed to level up: 100xCurrent Level

Every Level Up will give you +10atk and +20hp, but you can get extra hp by sacrifying yourself! Press E to remove 10atk and get 40hp for it! Totally worth it ;)

The more you kill, the faster they spawn and stronger they are! Survive as long as you can!
The browser Version might lag in higher levels. I'd recommend downloading the game instead.
